00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 # pygame + PyOpenGL version of Nehe's OpenGL lesson06
00003 # Paul Furber 2001 - m@verick.co.za
00004 
00005 import os
00006 from OpenGL.GL import *
00007 from OpenGL.GLU import *
00008 import pygame, pygame.image
00009 from pygame.locals import *
00010 
00011 xrot = yrot = zrot = 0.0
00012 textures = [0,0]
00013 
00014 def resize((width, height)):
00015     if height==0:
00016         height=1
00017     glViewport(0, 0, width, height)
00018     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION)
00019     glLoadIdentity()
00020     gluPerspective(45, 1.0*width/height, 0.1, 100.0)
00021     glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW)
00022     glLoadIdentity()
00023 
00024 def init():
00025     glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D)
00026     load_textures()
00027     glShadeModel(GL_SMOOTH)
00028     glClearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
00029     glClearDepth(1.0)
00030     glEnable(GL_DEPTH_TEST)
00031     glDepthFunc(GL_LEQUAL)
00032     glHint(GL_PERSPECTIVE_CORRECTION_HINT, GL_NICEST)
00033 
00034 def load_textures():
00035     texturefile = os.path.join('data','nehe.bmp')
00036     textureSurface = pygame.image.load(texturefile)
00037     textureData = pygame.image.tostring(textureSurface, "RGBX", 1)
00038 
00039     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textures[0])
00040     glTexImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, textureSurface.get_width(), textureSurface.get_height(), 0,
00041                   GL_RGBA, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, textureData );
00042     glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST)
00043     glTexParameterf(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST)
00044 
00045 
00046 def draw():
00047     global xrot, yrot, zrot
00048 
00049     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT)
00050     glLoadIdentity()
00051     glTranslatef(0.0,0.0,-5.0)
00052 
00053     glRotatef(xrot,1.0,0.0,0.0)
00054     glRotatef(yrot,0.0,1.0,0.0)
00055     glRotatef(zrot,0.0,0.0,1.0)
00056     
00057     
00058     glBegin(GL_QUADS)
00059         
00060     # Front Face (note that the texture's corners have to match the quad's corners)
00061     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00062     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00063     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00064     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00065         
00066     # Back Face
00067     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00068     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00069     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00070     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00071         
00072     # Top Face
00073     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00074     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00075     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00076     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00077         
00078     # Bottom Face       
00079     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00080     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00081     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00082     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00083         
00084     # Right face
00085     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00086     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00087     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f( 1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00088     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f( 1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00089         
00090     # Left Face
00091     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0, -1.0)        # Bottom Left Of The Texture and Quad
00092     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 0.0); glVertex3f(-1.0, -1.0,  1.0)        # Bottom Right Of The Texture and Quad
00093     glTexCoord2f(1.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0,  1.0)        # Top Right Of The Texture and Quad
00094     glTexCoord2f(0.0, 1.0); glVertex3f(-1.0,  1.0, -1.0)        # Top Left Of The Texture and Quad
00095         
00096     glEnd();                            
00097     
00098     xrot = xrot + 0.2
00099     yrot = yrot + 0.2
00100     zrot = zrot + 0.2
00101         
00102 
00103 def main():
00104 
00105     video_flags = OPENGL|DOUBLEBUF
00106     
00107     pygame.init()
00108     surface = pygame.display.set_mode((640,480), video_flags)
00109 
00110     resize((640,480))
00111     init()
00112 
00113     frames = 0
00114     ticks = pygame.time.get_ticks()
00115     while 1:
00116         event = pygame.event.poll()
00117         if event.type == QUIT or (event.type == KEYDOWN and event.key == K_ESCAPE):
00118             break
00119         
00120         draw()
00121         pygame.display.flip()
00122         frames = frames+1
00123 
00124     print "fps:  %d" % ((frames*1000)/(pygame.time.get_ticks()-ticks))
00125 
00126 
00127 if __name__ == '__main__': main()
